Description:
A TRUE COTTAGE STYLE FAMILY HOME!
Come venture into a passage of time in the much sought after Arcadia Estate, nestled in the heart of Officer. This beautiful family home on Henrietta Avenue is located just off the Cardinia Road exit off the freeway.
On a generously sized block this 4 bedroom home is perfect for the growing family with plenty of space for the kids to play in. Included is a large secure garden with a play set, slide, swing, chalk board - and did I mention the slide?!
The master bedroom boasts a WIR and ensuite with the remaining three bedrooms with built in robes. The main living area embraces a open kitchen with more character than you can poke a stick at.
The garage is perfectly set up for a social area or man cave without interfering with car access.
The kitchen offers great amounts of storage and bench space for all the chefs out there. From the kitchen dining area we step outside onto the decking, perfect for parties and BBQs, a backyard garden with a fenced in veggie patch and storage shed including side access for all you weekend warriors! And don't forget real NBN for all your tech focused needs!
This home will find a loving family quickly so don't miss out!
Insights: 149 other 4 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
In the Heart of Officer
Own your first home or Investment in the Heart of Officer
This 3 bedroom home, located right infront of Timbertop Blvd in Cherrington Estate, comes with a spacious master bedroom with ensuite, three more large bedrooms, Kitchen with 900mm stainless steel oven & Cooktop, dishwasher, stone benchtops, walkin pantry, ample storage space with softclose cabinets and drawers and open plan meals and living space that opens to a private backyard.
Be wowed by 2700mm high ceilings, downlights in hallway, kitchen, meals, living, dishwasher, stone benchtops in kitchen, ensuite, bathrooms, ducted heating, driveway, quality carpets in bedrooms, tiles to the remaining home and remote panel lift garage door.

Description:
5 BED AND 3 LIVING – NEAR NEW IN OFFICER!
Relax or entertain in this modern brilliantly located family home..
This property will appeal to families or investors looking for a near new home with quick freeway access and close to schools, train stations and shops. Only completed in 2016, this Simonds built home offers approx. 22SQ's approx. of living and a separate lined garage that could be used as a workshop or studio.
Boasting timber look floors and feature walls, you're spoilt for choice with 3 living areas to satisfy the needs of a large family. The master bedroom comes complete with WIR and an ensuite that has dual vanities, while the remaining 4 bedrooms all have BIR's with one ideally located to be a study/home office or 5th bedroom. The kitchen is the heart of any home and this is no exception, featuring Caesar stone benches, glass splashback, 90cm freestanding cooker, an Island bench for casual breakfasts, a large walk in pantry and space for a double door fridge.
Set on a 547SQM approx. corner block, this home is zoned for the recently opened Officer Secondary College that's just minutes away, presenting an outstanding opportunity for a new owner.
Inclusions: GDH, LED lights, NBN connection and a double remote garage.
Insights: 49 Firewheel Road, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2017 and 9 other 5 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
Almost 5.5 Acres of Prime Land!
With commanding views over the gully, this is a rare and unique offering of approximately 5.43 acres (2.2ha) of vacant land. Only one lucky purchaser will have the opportunity to build their dream residence on this gently undulating and private lot, with an elevated building site all set to go (subject to council approval). A picturesque dam is complimented by good fencing and a tree lined boundary, making this the ideal property for those that have horses or those seeking a lifestyle property offering peace and privacy that is still conveniently located moments schools, soon to be completed shopping precincts and a short distance from freeway access. Be sure to act before it is too late.

Description:
Premier location, your opportunity awaits!
Ready to build on and located in the prestigious Potters Grove Northside estate, this generous west facing block in the Stage 3 release boasts 294sqm of flat land allowing plenty of space to design your dream home. Ideally situated within minutes to the Officer Town Centre, walk to St Bridgits Primary school, plus great access to many private and public schools, the freeway and Officer Train station are within close proximity. With several eateries and cafes located in Arena Shopping complex and Beaconsfield township you really are in the heart of the precinct.
Buying here is an easy decision - this area is already filling fast, proving to be popular with recently completed sporting ovals and recreation facilities plus stunning picnic spots, D'Angelo Winery and vineyards including the 2 hectare Hicks Reserve boasting beautiful walking tracks, a lookout, the giant slide and magnificent playground and parklands for all the family to enjoy.
Put Officer at the top of your list, with the proposed new cinema complex, library, youth and community centres and future aquatic centre, why live anywhere else?
Don't delay, call Michael or Brenda Studd for more information!

Description:
Contemporary Living in Officer
This contemporary townhouse offers instant appeal with its modern façade, waterpark facing and its fantastic location. Situated in Arcadia Estate, this Officer estate is highly sought after for its affordability and location.
Step inside this modern beauty and enter the heart of the home. With a light filled contemporary gourmet kitchen equipped with stone benches, glass splashback, stainless steel appliances, overhead cupboards and breakfast bar with adjoining meals area overlooking the wetlands. Continuing through the home, into the spacious living room boasting with natural light which oversees the outdoor courtyard and easy to maintain backyard.
Upstairs offering three spacious bedrooms, the master bedroom with built in robes and balcony overlooking the gorgeous water lands and the additional two bedrooms with built in robes are serviced by the functional main bathroom with separate powder room.
Double remote control garage, limited maintenance gardens to the front and back, split system air conditioning all standard
If location is what matters to you look no further, shops, public transport, easy freeway access, schools and more all minutes away from your front door.
Whether you’re an investor, first home buyer or downsizing, this home is sure to tick all the right boxes and won’t last long!

Description:
Modern stylish living in Arena
Located at the gateway to the vibrant neighbourhood of Arena, this spotlessly presented, low maintenance townhouse is one of 'The Chelsea Collection' built by renowned builder AV Jennings. This home is substantial in size and is less than 2 years old, offering immediate park frontage onto Heatherbrae Reserve, enduring leafy green park views and the benefit of their stunning and convenient location for all the family to enjoy.
Enticing 3 spacious upstairs bedrooms and retreat/study with the Master offering a full ensuite and built in sliding robes whilst the remaining 2 bedrooms also have built in sliding robes and are serviced by the main bathroom.
Downstairs boasts generous open plan living with neutral tones and high ceilings, a modern central kitchen with stainless steel appliances including gas stove top, electric oven and dishwasher, a large meals area and laundry with separate toilet. Adding to the appeal, an outdoor courtyard area boasts premium exposed aggregate finish, perfectly private for relaxing with family or friends.
Long list of extras including reverse cycle split system in the living room, panel heaters in bedrooms and upstairs retreat/study, double car garage with internal access, plenty of storage space, security doors and flyscreens, stylish quality privacy and blockout blinds throughout, ceiling fans to the bedrooms, recycled water to the home, NBN availability and much more. This truly is comfortable and easy-care living.
Ideally situated with great access to many private and public schools, the freeway and Cardinia Road Train station are also within close proximity. With Woolies and several eateries and cafes located in Arena Shopping complex plus the added bonus of a family Medical Centre, you really are in the heart of the precinct.
This region is proving to be popular with recently completed sporting ovals and recreation facilities plus stunning picnic spots, D'Angelo Winery and vineyards. The new Officer town centre is set to thrive in years to come with the proposed cinema and shopping complex, proposed aquatic, youth and community centres and library, just to name a few. Don't miss this outstanding buying opportunity with nothing to do but move in, will this be your next home? Call Michael or Brenda today or see you at the Open for Inspection!
Insights: 28 Old Trafford Way, Officer VIC 3809 was last sold in 2018 and 69 other 3 bedroom house in Officer have recently been sold.

Description:
Nest or Invest
Conveniently located in the highly sought after Arena Estate and packed full of features, this wonderfully presented 3 bedroom townhouse has much to offer the growing family or savvy investor. Whether it's the entertainer's kitchen, solid wood heater for those chilly winter nights or the fantastic outdoor entertaining space complete with picturesque views of the parkland to entertain family and friends, this home will be sure to impress. Features include;
- 3 Bedrooms all with s/s heating/cooling, master with WIR and fully appointed ensuite
- 2 spacious living areas inc downstairs living/meals and upstairs retreat
- Quality kitchen with extra built in cupboards, stainless appliances & custom LED lighting
- Alfresco entertaining complete with landscaped courtyard
With 4.5Kw Solar system, tinted windows, crimsafe doors, LED downlights throughout, stacks of extra built in cupboards and DLUG with internal access completing the picture, this is truly one amazing home. Within close proximity to local shops, public transport and schools, you do not want to miss out on this one. Inspect today!

Description:
METRICON DISPLAY IN TIMBERTOP ESTATE!
Set your sights on this top of the range, Metricon display home in the highly-desired Timbertop Estate. The flawless home creates a spacious and modern ambience, fitted with exceptional fixtures and fittings throughout.
Be the first to live in this perfect home and enjoy the fantastic features it has to offer without having to do a thing!
This sophisticated and stylish family living comprising of light filled open plan indoor and outdoor living, an additional formal living room situated to the front of the home and outdoor living perfect for all family members.
To add to the amazing value, a designer kitchen tailored with 900mm stainless steel appliances, stone benches and butler’s pantry with added preparation area and storage comprising of brilliant fixtures.
The executive master bedroom is fitted with walk in robe and ensuite with double vanity and stone benches. Additional 3 bedrooms all containing built in robes and equipped with the main bathroom with double vanity and stone benches.
If entertaining is what you like then this top of the range entertaining area will complete your house hunting, flowing on from the main living is your oversized entertaining area, with enough space for the kids to still play on the grass, with a land size of 583m2 (approx.) this does not become available often.
Evaporative cooling and ducted heating, double remote control garage with internal and external access and beautifully landscaped.
Located in a prime location in Timbertop Officer, the most highly sought after estate in the suburb, transport, freeways and prestigious schools. What could you possibly want more?
Call Nicola now to schedule an inspection today! This one won’t last long.

Description:
Nest or Invest in Arcadia Estate!
Opportunity awaits the lucky buyer of this three bedroom home in the sought after Arcadia Estate! Set close to all amenities such as schools, shops, medical facilities and only walking distance to public transport, this home has all you could ask for.
Features of the home include master with walk in robe and full ensuite with the 2 remaining bedrooms having built in robes. A light and bright central living area overlooking the backyard with an open plan dining area & kitchen with quality stainless steel appliances including gas cooktops and dishwasher.
Additional features include ducted heating, quality blinds, double remote garage, downlights throughout, outdoor entertaining area with low maintenance landscaped gardens complete this perfect home, ideal for the first home buyer or investor
The home is located just a few minutes walk to the new Club Officer, and a short drive to both the Devonia Park and Arena Shopping complexes. Schools are very close by both secondary and primary. Situated just off Cardinia Road, you have direct access to both the M1 freeway and the Princes Highway.
Properties of this standard don't last long, so be quick! Call today to arrange an inspection.

Description:
Instantly Inviting, Perfectly Presented - Officer
Located in one of Officers most desired estates Potters Grove, in close proximity to Beaconsfield and Officer town centres, St Francis Xavier College, Arena Shopping Plaza, Officer Train station and M1 access!
Situated in a friendly Quiet Street nearby to parkland with a modern and elegant brick and rendered façade the home has plenty of street appeal.
Comprising four generous sized bedrooms including master with ensuite and walk in robe and three remaining bedrooms have built in robes and are serviced by the main bathroom.
Two separate living zones give every family member their own space to enjoy!
The modern kitchen exudes quality with stone bench, oversized pantry, 900mm stainless steel oven, range hood and dishwasher!
The open plan living makes entertaining a breeze and leads out to your very own alfresco and grassy backyard complete with turf and low maintenance gardens.
Other features of the home are as follows, ducted heating and evaporative cooling, double garage, quality blinds and carpets!
Make a time to inspect today!

Description:
Attention First Home Buyers
This very desirable home in Officer has a very functional floor plan providing the essentials for today's modern living at a very affordable price and it's barely 18 months new.
Presented in absolutely immaculate condition this Sienna home design has 3 good sized bedrooms. The main has ensuite and all have built in robes. The designer kitchen has stone benches and waterfall edges, gas cooking, dishwasher and plenty of cupboard space.

Description:
Quintessential Family Living
This proudly presented high-spec Carlisle home, conveniently positioned on an impressive 700sqm (approx.) corner block, in the desirable Arena Estate, is the recipe to please the whole family. Oozing exceptional quality & neutral toning’s throughout, this flexible floorplan features an expansive open plan crisp white kitchen boasting caesarstone benches, glass splashbacks, European appliances & butler’s pantry offering an abundance of storage space. Kick back & enjoy endless movies in the theatre room, or enjoy a quiet reading spot in the cosy front lounge room. An oversized master bedroom is impressive with stone-lined ensuite complete with a 2-person spa bath & fully fitted WIR. A further three bedrooms, also well-sized, take pride of place in their own kids wing to the rear of the home, where you will also find a kids retreat & main modern bathroom. Premium finishes include 10ft feature ceilings, square set cornicing, plantation shutters, evaporative cooling & ducted heating. A secluded grassy, fully fenced yard offers a safe place for children & pets to play as well as allows easy backyard entry. An undercover alfresco completes this family abode, where you will enjoy year-round barbecues & exceptionally low maintenance living. Located conveniently within walking distance to the Arena Shopping Precinct, Cardinia Road train station, this home is minutes from good local, state & private schools. Originality, quality & locality - this home is not to be missed. Call today for an inspection.

Description:
Modern Living in Officer
Opportunity awaits the lucky buyer of this immaculately kept four bedroom home in the sought after Arcadia Estate Officer! Set close to all amenities such as schools, shops, Club Officer, medical facilities and only walking distance to Cardinia Road train station, this home has all you could ask for.
Upon entry you are welcomed with a spacious master bedroom, ensuite with walk in robe with the three remaining great sized bedrooms featuring built-in-robes and their own private hallway connecting to the main bathroom and separate toilet.
Moving throughout the home, there is a large open plan combined lounge and meals area perfect for entertaining all year round.
The modern fully equipped kitchen features stainless steel appliances, gas cooktop and dishwasher. Perfect for the most serious of chefs!
Other features of the home include ducted heating, split system air-conditioner, double garage, low maintenance gardens with no work to be done!
Suitable for first home buyers, investors and down sizers! This home has it all and won’t last long, contact Candice today!
Going to Auction 20th May 2017 at 11 am.

Description:
Modern Appeal! Be Quick!
Located in the Arena Estate in Officer, this ideal family home will be sure to impress and will not last long at all.
Consisting of four bedrooms with master entailing walk in robe and ensuite. Moving throughout the home there is an abundance of storage and space with large linen press at the front of the home. A separate lounge room makes the perfect area for whatever your heart desires, large open plan living, kitchen and dining zone will be sure to impress. The kitchen itself will impress with a large island bench and ample amount of cupboard space. Stainless steel appliances provide a modern appeal. The remaining three bedrooms at the front of the home all with built in robes, and share the main bathroom and toilet.
Outside you are welcomed with an appealing façade with large frontage block, double remote access garage as well as low maintenance gardens. Out the back again the low maintenance continues with an under roofline alfresco with concrete base as well as a grassed area.
With all the amenities within close proximity and easy access to the Princes Highway, M1 freeway and the Cardinia train station, what more could you want in a home? Call today as an inspection is a must as this will not last long.

Description:
Blank Canvas In Potters Northside
The popular Potters North Estate is now sold out and this is your exclusive chance to acquire a prized block in the Estate if you have missed out on buying earlier. (Lot 121) 2 Jomon Way is conveniently located on the north side of Princes Highway. The flat corner block offers a 474m2 blank canvas to build your own dream home amongst properties that are nearly completed and where you can get a feel for the neighbourhood. Dont miss out on this exclusive opportunity to buy this block of land near all the Officer commodities, with the best primary and secondary schools in the region nearby and with easy access to/from the freeway. The vendors said SELL, so call us now to discuss.
